component.name: GitLab TODO Indicator
component.summary: A COSMIC applet that displays the number of GitLab TODO items

description.p: GitLab TODO Indicator is a system applet for the COSMIC desktop environment that displays the number of pending TODO items from your GitLab instance directly in the system panel. Click the indicator to refresh or open your GitLab TODOs in your browser.

ul.li: Real-time display of pending GitLab TODO count
Quick access to GitLab TODOs via browser
Error indication when API is unreachable
